issue.title: Add grooming phase to state machine
issue.body:
## Description

We need a grooming phase between triage and iteration to ensure issues are well-defined.

## Requirements

- Run 4 grooming agents (PM, Engineer, QA, Research) in parallel
- Summary agent synthesizes outputs and makes decision
- Add appropriate labels based on decision

## Todo

- [ ] Implement grooming state
- [ ] Create grooming agents
- [ ] Add E2E tests
